replies.author: uukl
replies.txt_content: 输入创建地皮世界的指令/mv什么的我忘了

replies.author: 紅月阿
replies.txt_content: 给玩家权限 如何创建请去 plotme 帖

replies.author: oyjh820008372
replies.txt_content:
/mv create plotworld normal -g PlotMe


这是创造地皮世界

replies.author: 赤色_夫人
replies.txt_content: 各位，我在论坛找了个高手帮我搞好了
